title: rAma nAma amrta
sahitya:
rAma nAma amrta pAnamE nAvuDaiyOrkkuyar jIvanamE shrI


anupallavi

  uraikka uraikka uDal ellAm inikkumE UmaiyallAdavark-kellAm eLidu


caraNam    eTTezhu dirkkum uyar aind-ezhuttikkum ivviraNDezhuttE uyir Aghum it-
tAraka mantram Ishan kAship-padiyil upadEsham sheida vaibhavam koNDa ati madhura
